title: 'Magnitudo 10' ed altre idiozie di Pastor Brandon Biggs - Gloria.tv
text:
'Magnitudo 10' ed altre idiozie di Pastor Brandon Biggs
Poichè i falsi profeti riempiono il sito con le solite previsioni (mai realizzate) e poi bloccano per evitare di essere confutati , una rapida ricerca può bastare a delineare i tratti dell'ultimo personaggio , il pastore Biggs.
Secondo quest'ultimo sarebbero possibili e imminenti sismi di magnitudo 10 , ovvero mai osservati dalla nascita della sismologia.
Mr Biggs said god had shown him a vision of a 10-magnitude earthquake which may kill thousands of people across the US, according to a report in
Contrary to Mr Biggs' claims, earthquakes of magnitude 10 or greater cannot happen, according to the
The magnitude of an earthquake is related to the length of the fault on which it occurs. That is, the longer the fault, the larger the earthquake. Currently, no fault on Earth is long enough to generate such a megaquake.
The largest earthquake ever recorded was a magnitude 9.5 on May 22, 1960 in Chile on a fault that is almost 1,000 miles long.
Secondo quest'ultimo sarebbero possibili e imminenti sismi di magnitudo 10 , ovvero mai osservati dalla nascita della sismologia.
Mr Biggs said god had shown him a vision of a 10-magnitude earthquake which may kill thousands of people across the US, according to a report in
Metro. Mr Biggs claimed that the earthquake would hit the New Madrid fault line, stretching through Missouri, Arkansas, Tennessee, Kentucky and Illinois.Contrary to Mr Biggs' claims, earthquakes of magnitude 10 or greater cannot happen, according to the
United States Geological Survey(USGS).The magnitude of an earthquake is related to the length of the fault on which it occurs. That is, the longer the fault, the larger the earthquake. Currently, no fault on Earth is long enough to generate such a megaquake.
The largest earthquake ever recorded was a magnitude 9.5 on May 22, 1960 in Chile on a fault that is almost 1,000 miles long.
